attributes.action: Make it illegal for British Citizens to make defamatory/smear remarks on American web sites and claim immunity using US law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently those wishing to create, extend or enhance smear campaigns against UK citizens and business leader do so using American web sites. When those web sites are challenged they revert to US law, even though the content is from GB, meaning UK citizens or companies have to invest huge sums of money with US law firms to resolve issues.
